tagline: The All-in-one tool to take your productivity to the next level
whyUseTool: Why Use a Tool For Planning?
firstUpsideBold: They help plan and organize goals
firstUpside: and break them down into tasks.
secondUpsideBold: They help plan and organize goals,
fourthUpsideBold: You can cooperate with your friends;
fifthUpsideBold: It will bring balance to your life,
fifthUpside: managing hobbies, family time and self-care.
importanceFirstP: By determining in prior the tasks to be completed, planning notes the way to deal with changes and unpredictable effects.
importanceH4: It helps us achieve our goals, and allows for more efficient use of time and other resources.
curseFirstP: Excessive planning can lead to anxiety, disappointment, stunted creativity, lack of trust and focus. I also have seen “overplanning” actually hinder and limit success.
raufText: This is a wider card with supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. This content is a little bit longer.
michaelText: This card has supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content.
rachelText: This is a wider card with supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. This card has even longer content than the first to show that equal height action.
blogHeader: Check out our blog for some tips
blogDescription: Our blog will help you with various topics surrounding self-improvement.
blogBold: Including Fitness, Mental Health and Relationships
aboutMeP: I'm a junior developer and this is my tutorial project. I've tried to implement most of what I've learned about full-stack development on this website; Mostly on the front-end part.
